titleStmt.title: A Sober dialogue between a country Friend, a London Friend, and one of G.K.'s Friends concerning the great difference of faith and doctrin betwixt many of the Quakers, especially their principal teachers and him.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by B. Aylmer ...,

notesStmt.note: Filmed copy includes, at end, title page only, of "An answer to a late pamphlet called a sober dialogue" (Wing 2nd. ed. A3305A, found at reel 1901:10).
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
